dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Notice of Claimed Infringement -- NIN011106-1]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, January 11, 2006 5:13 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; jsnyder@theesa.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Notice of Claimed Infringement -- NIN011106-1]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.


- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Notice of Claimed Infringement -- NIN011106-1
Date: Wed, 11 Jan 2006 16:05:25 -0500
From: Jake Snyder <jsnyder@theesa.com>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>

Entertainment Software Association

575 7th Street, NW Suite 300

Washington, DC 20004



Attention:  Piracy Enforcement - DMCA Officer

Telephone:  202-223-2400

Fax:  202-223-2401


E-mail:  dmca@theesa.com <mailto:dmca@theesa.com>





Date: January 11, 2006




Dear ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.,



I am an authorized representative of the Entertainment Software Association
("ESA"), which represents the intellectual property interests of twenty-six
(26) companies that publish interactive games for video game consoles,
personal computers, handheld devices and the Internet.



ESA is providing this letter of notification pursuant to the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act and 17 USC
